title: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is a versatile programming language used for creating interactive websites, web applications, and server-side development. It is the backbone of modern web development, allowing developers to add dynamic behavior to web pages.

items.title: JavaScript.Info
items.description: Modern JavaScript Tutorial: simple, but detailed explanations with examples and tasks, including: closures, document and events, object oriented programming and more.

items.title: JavaScript Tutorial
items.description: JavaScript Tutorial provides you with many practical tutorials that help you learn JavaScript from scratch quickly and effectively.

items.title: JavaScript - Tutorial Gateway
items.description: Tutorialgateway provides JavaScript tutorials with Examples and Screenshots. Please visit us to learn JavaScript Programming and Code easily.

items.title: JavaScript - MDN
items.description: JavaScript is a powerful programming language that can add interactivity to a website. It was invented by Brendan Eich.

items.title: JavaScript - Programiz
items.description: JavaScript is a powerful and flexible programming language. It can execute on a web browser that allows us to make interactive webpages such as popup menus, animations, form validation etc.

items.title: JavaScript - W3schools
items.description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
